text: Antonio Cerroni (12 August 1924 - 2020) was an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Antonio Cerroni
